mapper.select: SELECT m.id, category, title, d_day, nickname FROM joins j LEFT OUTER JOIN manna m ON j.manna_id = m.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON m.num = u.num WHERE j.num = #{num}
SELECT c.*, nickname FROM chat c LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON c.num = u.num WHERE c.manna_id = #{id} ORDER BY c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat(manna_id, num, content, reg_date) VALUES (#{mannaId}, #{num},#{content}, NOW())
